dcterms:description: Visual Genome contains images with annotated objects, attributes, and relationships, adopted to train Faster R-CNN for object detection.

dcterms:description: MIT67 Dataset contains 67 classes from indoor scenes covering a wide range of contexts, used to train hierarchical GCN.
